word:
III. Three Persons in the Godhead 

     There are three living persons of the heavenly trio; in the name of these three great powers--the Father, the Son, and the 

(442) 

Holy Spirit--those who receive Christ by living faith are baptized, and these powers will co-operate with the obedient subjects of heaven in their efforts to live the new life in Christ.-- Evangelism, p. 615.
